name: WormsZone.io - Hungry Snake
description:
In Worms Zone, cheerful, plucky worms compete in an enormous arena.
Grow the largest worm and beat the other players to become champion. In the wardrobe you can choose skins for your worm or create your own.

There are several tactics for becoming a champion: "fighter", "trickster", or "builder". Which will you be?

Remember, whatever tactic you choose, avoid running into your opponent or you lose. You can beat your opponent by encircling him, and then collect all the tasty treats that fall out of him.

In the arena you can find bonuses that boost your worm's powers. Take advantage of these opportunities – bonuses will help you reach your goal.

Play online or even offline - the game detects your connection automatically.
